cause.description:
Barack Obama was an early supporter of Net Neutrality. True to the spirit of Internet freedom, he announced his support on a podcast.
We will keep watch over Barack Obama's stances on Internet-related issues, and thank him when he stands strong for the little guy's rights online.
1. Internet freedom is important
2. Net Neutrality is important
3. The rights of the little guy are important.
cause.mission: thank Obama for respecting Internet user's rights
cause.name: Barack Obama
